survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards sustainable packaging in the retail sector.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for ease of response and analysis.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for products with sustainable packaging?
answer_options: No, I would not pay extra
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 response is 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important'
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to quantify willingness to pay.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for products with sustainable packaging?
answer_options: No, I would not pay extra
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 response is 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important'

questions.question_text: What factors discourage you from choosing products with sustainable packaging?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 response is 'Not very important' or 'Not important at all'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What factors discourage you from choosing products with sustainable packaging?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 response is 'Not very important' or 'Not important at all'

questions.question_text: How do you typically dispose of product packaging?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up.

script.question_text: How do you typically dispose of product packaging?
